name: Graphing Covid-19
headline: Graphing Covid-19 with Python
description: Shortly after APIs became available, I looked to visualize that information into a web page that would keep me updated with how COVID-19 is affecting the United States.

name: #BLM on Twitter
headline: Understanding the Sentiment of #BLM on Twitter
description: At the height of protests around the country, I became curious of how different parts of the country were reacting. Using Tweepy and some simple NLP, I was able to do just that.

name: Github Activity
headline: Exploring the Github API to track all my projects
description: Wanting to explore the Github API, I decided to track my projects in a way that made more sense to me.
